# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_executable(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool)


target_compile_options(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  sdk-library-grpc-client-v3
  src-client-table
)

target_allocator(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

target_sources(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/tests/integration/sessions_pool/main.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool
  COMMAND
  public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool
)

set_property(
  TEST
  public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  "YDB_TEST_ROOT=sdk_tests;YDB_DRIVER_BINARY=ydb/apps/ydbd/ydbd"
)

vcs_info(public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool)

set_property(
  TEST
  public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-sessions_pool
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
